enumeratedValue.name: MODE0
enumeratedValue.description: SPI Mode 0 Enable - sampling at first edge, first edge is rising

enumeratedValue.name: MODE1
enumeratedValue.description: SPI Mode 1 Enable - sampling at second edge, first edge is rising

enumeratedValue.name: MODE2
enumeratedValue.description: SPI Mode 2 Enable - sampling at first edge, first edge is falling

enumeratedValue.name: MODE3
enumeratedValue.description: SPI Mode 3 Enable - sampling at second edge, first edge is falling
